name: cloud jumper (karelproer)
description:
jump on the clouds to get as high as possible, but don't touch a lightning cloud. if you jump on a rainy cloud, it will disappear. when clouds are to far under you, they will disappear too. the clouds are procedurally generated, so if something seems impossible, it probably is. if that happens, just refresh the page. if you go into the left edge, you will teleport to the right edge and from the right edge to the left edge.

controls:
-jump without the up arrow
-go right and left with the corresponding arrows

this project is made using pge and emscripten.
